title: Hero’s Redo ~ A Hero That Once Saved the World Reborn as a Girl ~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Slice of Life
tags: Adventurers   Appearance Changes   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beautiful Female Lead   Elemental Magic   Female Protagonist   Former Hero   Heroes   Magic   Male to Female   Monsters   Multiple POV   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Time Skip
author: Kobayashi Takashi   小林誉
description: The Hero was traumatized by politics and people afraid of him for being too powerful, so the mage in his party decided to turn him into a girl. But he was so traumatized to interact with humans that he just hid inside the mountains until two girls who came to the mountain were caught in danger. After saving them, they decided to bring her to their town to pay her back for helping them.>
